EntryName	RBMS1_HUMAN
ProteinName	RNA-binding motif, single-stranded-interacting protein 1 (Single-stranded DNA-binding protein MSSP-1) (Suppressor of CDC2 with RNA-binding motif 2)
GeneName	RBMS1 C2orf12 MSSP MSSP1 SCR2
Length	406
Function	Single-stranded DNA binding protein that interacts with the region upstream of the MYC gene. Binds specifically to the DNA sequence motif 5'-CTT-3'. Probably has a role in DNA replication.
Subcellular Location	Nucleus
